Module jBomberman
Package model

Class PowerUpMediator

java.lang.Object
model.PowerUpMediator
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnjoyPowerUpMediator
public abstract class PowerUpMediator extends Object
PowerUp are regulated by their mediator. They aren't wrapped to Tesserae.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Prop p, PowerUpMediator.Message m)
      Method invoked in classes that use this mediator to interact with the powerups currently present in the game session.
      Parameters:
      p - Cartesian reference point
      m - message can be: add a possible spawn or destroy a powerup

    • setPowerUps

      public void setPowerUps(TesseraAbstract[][] grid)
      Generate powerups at the coordinates collected so far into the actual level's grid and then empty the collection of these coordinates.
      Parameters:
